import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from "react-helmet-async"; const meta = { title: "", meta: [], link: [], style: [], script: [], }; const Pagination = ({ totalItems, itemsPerPage, currentPage, onPageChange, }) => { const totalPages = Math.ceil(totalItems / itemsPerPage); const handlePageClick = (page) => { if (page >= 1 && page <= totalPages) { onPageChange(page); } }; }; export default function UserDetails() { const [menuVisible, setMenuVisible] = useState(false); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const [isVerificationView, setIsVerificationView] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const burger = document.querySelector(".navbar-burger"); const close = document.querySelector(".navbar-close"); const backdrop = document.querySelector(".navbar-backdrop"); const toggleMenu = () => { setMenuVisible((prevVisible) => !prevVisible); }; if (burger) burger.addEventListener("click", toggleMenu); if (close) close.addEventListener("click", toggleMenu); if (backdrop) backdrop.addEventListener("click", toggleMenu); return () => { if (burger) burger.removeEventListener("click", toggleMenu); if (close) close.removeEventListener("click", toggleMenu); if (backdrop) backdrop.removeEventListener("click", toggleMenu); }; }, []); return ( <>
